contents:
What is your political ideology?

Your Result: Market Liberalism
[url=https://pincong.rocks/article/4253][/url] 
[url=https://pincong.rocks/article/4253][/url]93%
[url=https://pincong.rocks/article/4253][/url]Market liberalism is the right-wing counterpart to social liberalism and it espouses negative liberty, the non-aggression principle, private property, capitalist ownership of the means of production, a downsizing of government intervention and the state as a whole, and social permissiveness.
[url=https://pincong.rocks/article/4253][/url]
